Articles.Content:
We call them "litho" here, but i am not sure this is an international definition.

I am talking about one of the opening screens of KSP. The painted picture where 3 kerbals seem to be rushing into space with their faces expressing all kinds of emotions.

The thing looks painted and has red stripes in it. ( i am saying this because red is not overly represented in KSP)

I think it really really looks cool and would make an awesome poster. Now i would buy it if the price is right, but i have not even found a digital one yet.

I tried printscreen, but the result is black, it will not copy it.

Has anyone got a link? Or is it copyrighted?

Edited February 11, 2014 by fastbikkel

Do you mean this?

http://mk01.deviantart.com/art/Kerbal-Space-Odyssey-243246016

That's the author's deviantart page. You can order prints from there.

Do you mean this?

http://mk01.deviantart.com/art/Kerbal-Space-Odyssey-243246016

That's the author's deviantart page. You can order prints from there.

YES!!!

Thanks a lot, i searched but i had no clue how to look for it and all.

Thanks again, this picture is really amazing, the details, the feeling of speed, i love it.
